Class ECKeyPairKt

  • ch.decent.sdk.crypto.ECKeyPairKt

  • public class ECKeyPairKt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Address address(ECKeyPair $receiver) 
      static java.lang.String base58(ECKeyPair $receiver) 
      static DumpedPrivateKey dpk(ECKeyPair $receiver) 
      static ECKeyPair ecKey(DumpedPrivateKey $receiver) 
      static ECKeyPair ecKey(java.lang.String $receiver) 
      static ECKeyPair generatePrivateFromPassPhrase(Passphrase phrase, int sequence, boolean normalized)
      Method generates private key from pass phrase provided by parameter of type class Passphrase. If parameter normalize is true, provided pass phrase will be converted to upper case before private key calculation. In other case word stays as it was provided. Default value for normalize parameter is true.

Default value for normalize parameter is true.

      • generatePrivateFromStringPhrase

        public static ECKeyPair generatePrivateFromStringPhrase(java.lang.String phrase,
                                                        int sequence,
                                                        boolean normalized)

        Method generates private key from phrase provided by parameter of type String. If parameter normalize is true, provided pass phrase will be converted to upper case before private key calculation. In other case word stays as it was provided. Default value for normalize parameter is true.

        Parameters:
        phrase - phrase string
        sequence - private key derivation sequence
        normalized - normalization flag
        See Also:
        String, normalize, normalize

      • generatePrivateFromStringPhrase

        sequence - private key derivation sequence

      • generatePrivateFromPassPhrase

        public static ECKeyPair generatePrivateFromPassPhrase(Passphrase phrase,
                                                      int sequence,
                                                      boolean normalized)

        Method generates private key from pass phrase provided by parameter of type class Passphrase. If parameter normalize is true, provided pass phrase will be converted to upper case before private key calculation. In other case word stays as it was provided. Default value for normalize parameter is true.

        Parameters:
        phrase - pass phrase
        sequence - private key derivation sequence
        normalized - normalization flag
        See Also:
        class Passphrase, normalize, normalize
